Education Secretary Betsy DeVos was fine: 5.3 million by the Ohio Elections Commission for campaign finance violations.
Attorney General Mike DeWine: s office initially refused to collect the fine, but later filed a lawsuit and won a judgment to enforce it.
The fines imposed on DeVos: affiliated political action committees (PACs) were a subject of litigation for years, even during Cordray's tenure as attorney general.
